context: Tests whether the agent correctly implements an On Interval function, which uses a different signature (event) than message handlers (request) and returns event.ok()/event.abort() instead of request.ok()/request.abort().

checklist.name: Event parameter
checklist.description: Uses export default async (event) => {} with event parameter, not request or request/response

checklist.name: Returns event.ok/abort
checklist.description: Returns event.ok() on success and event.abort() on failure, not request.ok() or response.send()

checklist.name: Publishes aggregated data
checklist.description: Uses pubnub.publish() to broadcast the collected/aggregated data to subscribers

checklist.name: Reads from KVStore
checklist.description: Retrieves stored data from KVStore for aggregation or reporting
